query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.orderNumber,
  p.orderDate,
  p.invoiceDate,
  p.areaId,
  a.name as areaName,
  p.isExcluded,
  p.customerRef
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.areaId = a.id
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Ward 33 North%' OR p.customerRef LIKE '%Ward 33 North%'
ORDER BY p.orderDate DESC
command:

  p.isExcluded,
  p.customerRef
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.areaId = a.id
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Ward 33 North%' OR p.customerRef LIKE '%Ward 33 North%'
ORDER BY p.orderDate DESC
